definition: the act of giving students or candidates a test (as by questions) to determine what they know or have learned
details:
noun
- the act of giving students or candidates a test (as by questions) to determine what they know or have learned
= synonyms: examination
- the act of subjecting to experimental test in order to determine how well something works
= example: the act of subjecting to experimental test in order to determine how well something works
- an examination of the characteristics of something
= example: an examination of the characteristics of something
